Description:
Develop and implement online marketing strategies in line with company objectives.
Manage advertising campaigns on social media platforms and other digital channels.
Design and create marketing content using Photoshop and other design tools.
Monitor and analyze the performance of advertising campaigns, and deliver periodic reports.
Work on improving conversion rates and increasing customer loyalty.
Collaborate with various teams within the company to achieve marketing goals.
Stay updated with the latest trends in digital marketing and apply best practices.Skills
Skills:
High proficiency in using Photoshop and other design tools.
Experience in managing marketing campaigns on social media platforms.
Ability to analyze data and derive insights.
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to work within a team and under pressure.
